html:
7.19.25  12:47 pm   Have you ever experienced anything that would probably be worthwhile learning about and understanding, yet you decided not to just cuz it's cool whether you know how it works or not?
I feel that way about the percussion in your songs. I don't understand it but I can tell it's special.

      in most cases, i do have the desire to learn, but it's not always the right time

7.19.25  10:45 am   Whats your opinion on questions about questions avout questions about questions?

      sounds recursive

7.19.25  10:13 am   What is your opinion on flags?

     neutral

     Which flag is your favorite, if you have one?

      the checkered flag, at the finish line

7.19.25  8:20 am   what helps you when youre having a bad day

      think about what another day could be like

7.19.25  7:54 am   I don't understand how the song is supposed to write me, am I doing it wrong? 

      sure. maybe you are being pressured into using a method that doesn't work or make sense for you

7.19.25  5:39 am   Sometimes art teachers will suggest painting multiple paintings at the same time. it can make you less nick-picky and can give you more perspective on the paintings itself and on the process as a whole.

Have you felt similarly about your department system for making videos?

      yes, but i'll admit there are also huge disadvantages

7.19.25  4:46 am   if you had to name a cat, what WOULDN'T you name it

      anything

7.19.25  3:59 am   Would you love me if I was a worm?

      i'm not sure

7.19.25  3:18 am   If you were put in a room with all your equipment and locked in there and forced to make a video, would that video be good?

      it might be

7.19.25  3:14 am   what's the first step to making non-lyricced music

      maybe you can pick some words you like, to not be in the song, but you can think about them while you are making the song

7.19.25  2:44 am   WHY ARE YOU ANSWERING LONGER QUESTIONS/ GIVING LONG ANSWERS?!?

      what can cause this effect, from the reader's point of view, is if you first read some shorter ones, then read a longer one. if you want to experience the opposite effect, you can read longer ones, then a shorter one

7.19.25  2:41 am   did you know that skyscrapers are made of seashells

      no, and i'm still not sure about that

7.19.25  2:23 am   what, if anything, about our current understanding of reality is most likely to be looked at in the next few centuries as obviously incorrect, in your opinion?

      "the grass is greener on the other side of the fence"

7.19.25  12:54 am   Are you a philosopher?

      might philosoph a thing here and there

7.19.25  12:45 am   have you ever played animal crossing before

      no

7.19.25  12:28 am   what do u know about hypnosis

      conceptually it's a good metaphor

7.18.25  10:50 pm   it took me almost 10 years of musical experience to realize that the word "tone" is just "note" rearranged differently. I might be insane

      have you ever noticed that a guitar player might play a "power chord" while using a "power cord"

7.18.25  8:06 pm   what's your opinion on trains

      they are single handedly destroying the horse industry

7.18.25  7:20 pm   hi bill should I stay local for college or #..no

      i'm not sure

7.18.25  7:01 pm   Music/editing on the computer can be hard on your eyes and hands if you put in a lot of hours. What do you do to stay healthy and prevent eye strain etc?

      first if you want to prevent eye strain, get the brightness way down, and the font size way up if you have to

7.18.25  6:55 pm   if your name wasn't bill which name would you like to have?

      Ivan the Terrible

7.18.25  6:09 pm   do you ever get annoyed when people ask you "is [song 1] a sequel to [song 2]" just because the titles have a similar theme, almost as if they just look at the title and never actually listen to the song

      no

7.18.25  4:46 pm   if you could have an eye color different from the one you have now, real or impossible, which one would you pick?

      the same. which, according to the rules of your question, is impossible

7.18.25  4:30 pm   How hard would I need to squeeze a tuna sandwich to make a black hole?

     pretty hard

7.18.25  4:02 pm   can you show your background on your computer

      sure

7.18.25  1:39 pm   what's a video of yours i haven't seen yet

      one of the ones i'm working on now

7.18.25  1:17 pm   If you even care about internet culture and where memes are going, do you think they wpuld come to an end anytime soon?

      it will be called something different. for example, in the past, there was something called 'tropes', or a 'catch phrase'. we usually don't call it that anymore, but those phenomena are alive today under different names, and or perhaps with more complexity

7.18.25  12:40 pm   ever had a dream within a dream and then realize other people (in the dream) were having the same dream? 

      i was going to say no but now that i think about it yes

7.18.25  11:33 am   sometimes your response to a question doesn't seem to attempt to answer the question, but often from a reader point of view it makes for a better reading experience than if you did just answer the question. which makes me wonder if the whole "q&a" premise of this page is actually just a cover up and this is actually more of a "make a prompt for bill wurtz to come up with a fun response" type deal (but i realize that's just one of many scenarios). but now that i think about it that might be true for in-person q&a's and interviews as well. does any of this make sense

      of course it does

7.18.25  10:37 am   What kind of authority does Simon have to make me do everything he says? Why must I put my hands on my head, hips, etc?

      it's hypnosis

7.18.25  10:08 am   are we isolated atoms floating in the void that believe we are interacting with other beings but in fact only perceive that to be the case because we couldn't have existed as we are except if we did perceive that and everything which can exist must exist? 

      i'm not sure if i'm following your logic, but i agree with the very last part

7.18.25  10:01 am   it's my birthday, does every work of art make a new world or can they come into a world which already exists

      both are very common approaches

7.18.25  9:27 am   bill what do you think the meaning of life is, like no jokes i just genuinely want to know.

      all meanings. life has unlimited meaning. you can discover as many as you can handle, or maybe even just a little bit more

7.18.25  9:18 am   How did you come up with the dialogue for "2 friends on the beach" and "Perfect"?

      i made it up

7.18.25  9:10 am   what do you mean by "i'm an idiot." like, what kind of idtiot.

      let's put this back in context here. someone asked me why i am bad at collaborating. the truth is that i usually don't like anyone else's ideas. but i thought that wasn't very nice to say, so i said something totally different instead ("i'm an idiot"). It may certainly be true, but it's not what it feels like. when i try to collaborate, actually, what it feels like is that i'm a total genius and the other person is an idiot. which, needless to say, is totally obnoxious and i would not want to subject anyone to that. that being said, i am still not ruling out the fact that i am a total idiot and just don't realize it. heck, i've seen that happen to plenty of people, there's no reason why it couldn't or shouldn't happen to me

7.18.25  9:10 am   Why are potatoes called earth apples in Dutch and French?

      maybe that's what they really are

7.18.25  8:22 am   opinions on manual transmissions?

      it reminds me of the old days when people used to eat their own breakfast

7.18.25  7:09 am   If you were to create your own video-editing software, specifically optimized and tailor-made for your style of video making, what would be its distinguishing features?

      being a can of worms

7.18.25  5:51 am   Hey Bill! I am trying to write my own music and Im wondering what you would recommend I focus on learning next. I'm comfortable with 7th chords and I finally understand the difference between dominant 7s vs. Major and minor 7s. I know the major scale (do re me fa so la ti do), and I can use the chords/scale degrees (I ii iii IV V vi vii) to build progressions..

But I feel like when I write, I keep playing octaves and a 5th on the left hand and major or minor triads on the right. Now that I learned all major, minor and 7th chords in root position, everything I play as a roman numeral progression sounds so similar (and not very great since I don't know my inversions yet) I'm vaguely comfortable using diminished/augmented chords or some passing chords here and there and I'm familiar with raising the bass note a whole step up for a jazzy slash chord at the very end of a phrase... But other than a few things like that, my jazz vocabulary is pretty limited and I can't seem to figure out how you do all these complex key modulations. There has to be a better way than aimlessly watching a bunch of jazz music theory videos on YouTube, right? Should I grind out the inversions? Should I learn how to write in minor keys? If you have a textbook I could read or anything to point me in tne right direction, I'd really appreciate your help!

     do the words. you remind me of someone who has studied cars for thousands of years but has never even seen a road. do the words now

7.18.25  4:48 am   How come you can say you're doing something "in practice" to mean actually doing the thing, but you can also say you're "practicing", meaning you're improving before actually doing the thing. Is that not confusing?

      it is confusing. real life is not exactly describable. it's a game of cat and mouse, with which language can never fully keep up

7.18.25  4:32 am   whats a chord progression

      nothing. it's just chords. it's like "what's a potato consternation". nothing. it's just potatoes

7.18.25  2:51 am   do you live on earth?

      yes i do

7.18.25  2:30 am   which philosopher was the most right ?

      are you trying to tell me there's no more philosophers

7.18.25  2:09 am   why is an orange called an orange but an apple isn't called red?

      i mean, what the heck, why wasn't the first automobile called an uber

7.18.25  12:57 am   if you were a college teacher and you had a class that is kind of niche and not necessarily for a certain major what would it be?

      how to get out of a niche

7.17.25  11:18 pm   how much food is too much

      maybe a thousand pounds

7.17.25  10:24 pm   how many departments are left in the total departments required to complete the set of videos? or are the departments somewhat abscract? when i was trying to figure out how many departments there could possibly be i realized i clould divide the process to extremely extreme amounts of small pieces 

      yes your reasoning is correct, it is uncountable

7.17.25  9:22 pm   do you prefer to be cold or to be hot?

      i can't decide

7.17.25  9:18 pm   Thoughts on salt lamps?

      i'll believe it when i see it

7.17.25  9:01 pm   I'm a big fan of velcro are you

      how about this; i am a fan of velcro fans
